text:
@PressSec @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump World Renowned Coronavirus Expert Donald J Trump is upset that Dr. Fauci has better ratings than him. 

15 cases will soon be down to zero.

It will magically disappear. 

And the dumbf*ck can’t figure out why...
